price: Kuma lalle haƙĩƙa Mun rubũta a cikin Littãfi baicin Ambato* (Lauhul Mahfũz) cẽwa ƙasã, bayĩna sãlihai, sunã gãdonta.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ كَتَبۡنَا فِي ٱلزَّبُورِ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ٱلذِّكۡرِ أَنَّ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ يَرِثُهَا عِبَادِيَ ٱلصَّٰلِحُونَ
footnotes: * Allah Yanã mallakar da ƙasa bãyinsa sãlihai, bã zã ta fita daga gare su ba sai idan sun musanya addininsu na ƙwarai da wani mugu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walaqad katabnā fī al-zabūri min baʿdi al-dhik'ri anna al-arḍa yarithuhā ʿibādiya al-ṣāliḥūna
